additional_requirement: discuss vague or poorly defined safety standards
analyze conflicting safety data from different sources
explore safety challenges in markets lacking formal regulation
debate potential harm versus technological advancement
evaluate the adequacy of safety measures for new tech
assess how public misperceptions can undermine safety protocols
discuss the trade-offs between increased surveillance for safety and privacy rights
highlight risks associated with non-professional handling of tools and materials
debunk common myths about safety measures and practices
explore potential hazards in virtual reality settings
